backend/main.mo: Backend actor storing user profiles, events, chat messages, approvals, and access control with helpers enforcing onboarding and registration.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature-evidence metadata mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that mounts the frontend app and loads the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/scripts/frontend-build-check.sh: Shell script that runs TypeScript type checking and a Vite production build to verify frontend health.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Explains the purpose and usage of frontend build-check scripts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and application routes wrapped in the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChatModera: Admin panel for approving and deleting chat messages using chat mutations with confirmation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventsMana: Provides an interface for listing, creating, and deleting community events using form dialogs and event management hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileVal: Displays public profiles and allows admins to toggle validation status with mutation actions and badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/PublicProf: Lets admins select a user profile and update fields like display name, company info, biography, and links.
frontend/src/components/admin/Statistics: Fetches platform statistics and displays totals for users, messages, events, and points in metric cards.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles user login and logout via Internet Identity, showing different button states based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Blocks access to children unless the caller is an admin, showing a denial card when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Redirects unauthenticated users to home and displays a sign‑in prompt card when access is restricted.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOnbo: Redirects authenticated users to onboarding if their profile is incomplete, showing a loader during checks.
Allows users to vote on chat messages, triggering a mutation and showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sponsors: Renders a grid of sponsor cards with external links for more information.
Defines the main app layout and navigation menu, showing items based on auth, onboarding, and admin state, with mobile support and initialization warnings.
frontend/src/components/system/Initializ: Displays slow-loading or error banners during initialization and provides retry or reload actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks to check admin status and fetch site statistics using the safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Exposes basic authentication state derived from Internet Identity, including principal and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Implements chat message queries and mutations with refetching, optimistic updates, and profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the caller’s private user profile with special handling for authorization-related errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvents.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and RSVPing to events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializationWatc: Tracks slow or failed initialization steps for auth, actor setup, and profile loading, producing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and identity loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Fetches leaderboard data from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicProfiles.ts: Provides hooks to list, fetch, create/update, and validate public profiles via the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations for user registration, onboarding completion, and saving private user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity with background admin initialization and safe loading via react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports global stylesheet from the parent directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for statistics, profiles, public profiles, events, and chat management.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays the community guestbook, allowing users to post, view, and delete messages with authentication and onboarding checks.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityDirectoryPag: Shows a directory of public user profiles with validation indicators and links to profile detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Displays event details, participation stats, and lets authenticated users RSVP with success and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/EventsListPage.tsx: Shows a grid of upcoming events with basic details and links to each event’s detail page.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and redirects authenticated users to onboarding or community.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a ranked leaderboard of users by points with icons for top positions.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Loads the user’s private profile, allows editing and saving, and handles onboarding or error states.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Guides authenticated users through registration and onboarding steps, with error handling and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/PartnersPage.tsx: Displays a grid of partner cards with logos, descriptions, and external links using card and button UI components.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Fetches and displays a public profile with header, biography, services, and social links, including loading and not-found states with auth/onboarding gating.
frontend/src/utils/linkParsing.ts: Provides URL validation, extraction, and label formatting utilities for profile text fields.
frontend/src/utils/profileDisplay.ts: Generates display name, initials, and secondary text for public profiles based on available fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliases, optimized builds, and a dev server proxy.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing NG COIN’s architecture, feature set, known issues, and current development state.
